trans-unit.source: Specifies how an image is positioned within a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como uma imagem é posicionada dentro de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the members of this enumeration to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.
trans-unit.target: Use os membros dessa enumeração para definir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox.SizeMode%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` method from the form's constructor or Load-event handling method.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole o seguinte código em um formulário do Windows e a chamada a `InitializePictureBoxAndButton` método de construtor ou método de manipulação de evento de carregamento do formulário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is sized equal to the size of the image that it contains.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> é dimensionado igual ao tamanho da imagem que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: The image is displayed in the center if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is larger than the image.
trans-unit.target: A imagem é exibida no centro se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> for maior que a imagem.

trans-unit.source: If the image is larger than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />, the picture is placed in the center of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> and the outside edges are clipped.
trans-unit.target: Se a imagem for maior do que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />, a imagem será colocada no centro do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> e as bordas externas serão cortadas.

trans-unit.source: The image is placed in the upper-left corner of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: A imagem é colocada no canto superior esquerdo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The image is clipped if it is larger than the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> it is contained in.
trans-unit.target: A imagem é recortada se for maior do que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> no qual está contida.

trans-unit.source: The image within the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> is stretched or shrunk to fit the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.
trans-unit.target: A imagem dentro de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" /> é ampliada ou reduzida para ajustar o tamanho de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox" />.

trans-unit.source: The size of the image is increased or decreased maintaining the size ratio.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da imagem aumenta ou diminui mantendo a proporção de tamanho.
